Name: Williamson-Doré Vineyard Syrah
Wine Description: Blackberries, smoked earth, olive and assorted meatiness. Medium to full-bodied, focused, elegant and with awesome purity, it will certainly be an outstanding wine that will have a decade or more of longevity.

Name: Bandol Rouge
Wine Description: Very full-bodied wine, good balance (alcohol and material).

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley
Wine Description: Intense, smoke-accented aromas of cherry and blackcurrant, with Indian spice and floral notes adding complexity. Juicy and precise on the palate, offering energetic dark fruit flavors and a hint of chewing tobacco.

Name: Cannubi Barolo
Wine Description: It is medium ruby in colour with a relatively pronounced nose of raspberry, strawberry and wood smoke. It’s medium bodied with poise and strength, great depth of red fruit on the palate plus some sagey herb. The rich tannins are nicely integrated, the natural acidity high, and it finishes long with raspberry and a sensation of crushed flowers.

Name: Bullnose Syrah
Wine Description: It is a dark ruby colour with aromas and flavours of violets, black cherry liqueur and spice, intermingled with notes of prune and raspberry. The rich, full-flavoured palate displays velvety, even tannins.

Name: Domaine Latour Corton Grand Cru
Wine Description: It is a beautiful intense ruby color. The nose is clean with notes of cherry and licorice. It is a very structured.

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: This wine is bright medium red with a aromas of redcurrant, sour red cherry, sweet roses, licorice, and tar, along with a hint of sexy vanillin oak. The palate displays sweet spices, tobacco and earth, nicely balanced with ripe firm tannins.

Name: Enchanted Path
Wine Description: Notes of fresh plum, clove and hints of chocolate mint. Big red berry fruits, aniseed spice with layers of milk chocolate.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Deep purple to black in the glass. Nose of fresh blackberry, cassis syrup, spiced cherry with hints of black olives, herbs, then roasted meat, tobacco, touch of graphite. Mid-palate shows red and black fruits of cherry, blackberry, black currants. The mountain tannins combined with all the lavish new oak has resulted in a powerful wine that requires bottle age to reveal itself. The finish is long and grippy due to firm tannins.

Name: La Haute Cuvée Red
Wine Description: Firm, focused and elegant, deftly balancing ripe currant, blueberry and spice flavors against refined tannins and hints of mint and thyme. A freshly brewed tea note adds to the harmony on the lingering finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Intense, overt aromas of blackberry and raspberry hints of tobacco and spices tempting you towards your first sip. The wine is classic on the palate with enticing flavors of mature plum, black cherry, and dark chocolate lengthened by the integrated background of cedar, nutmeg and vanilla.

Name: Brunate Barolo
Wine Description: Color with ruby highlights, right intensity and tone. The bouquet is composite, rich, full and persistent, with hints of vanilla, sweet spices, tobacco, mountain hay and underbrush.

Name: Warrior Princess Block Zena Crown Vineyard Pinot Noir
Nebbiolo d’alba
Wine Description: Garnet red colour. Intense and delicate bouquet with reminiscences of flowers. Its flavour is dry, full and pleasantly tannic.

Name: Barolo Vigna Cerretta
Wine Description: Markedly garnet red with a muted coral effulgence. Full and pleasant, ethereal and stimulating, a wealth of a fragrances reminiscent of dried fruit, tabacco, laureal and vanilla. Well structured, full - bodied, dry and persistent.

Name: Legacy Petite Sirah
Food Pairing: Beef, Lamb, Veal, Poultry, Game (deer, venison)

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: This is a multifaceted Merlot: forest strawberries, spiced plums and anise with a velvety texture that make your taste buds ask for more! The wine’s firm tannins.

Name: Palette Rouge
Wine Description: An elegant yet well-constituted wine of great depth. Robust, rich in noble tannins, this wine has good aging potential.

Name: Viñedos en San Vicente de la Sonsierra
Barolo
Wine Description: Very rich and delicious with supple red fruits, some ripe plum and floral undertones Tongue: extremely lush on the palate; delicious red fruit; black tea; sassafras root.

Name: Cabernet Franc
Wine Description: A bold and powerful take on the varietal. This wine begins with a beautiful, midnight color and is packed with aroma and flavor of great magnitude. This Cabernet Franc is definitely not shy in black cherry, barrel vanillin and even.... a touch of damp forest....but it works! Flavors of pepper, anise, espresso and black plum abound and remain on the palate for over a minute.

Name: Estate Vineyard Syrah
Wine Description: A high toned aroma of fresh plums and gravel reminiscent palate is full and light at the same time the mouth-feel is almost textured.

Name: Fiddlestix Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Intense fresh fruits lead the palate, and the focus settles on ripe flavors of black cherry, cassis, and currants intermixed with holiday spice, cola, and tobacco notes.

Name: Nebbiolo d’Alba Valmaggiore
Wine Description: This is not a “baby Barolo” or a second wine at all – it is a distinct interpretation of a completely different geographic winemaking zone. The wine shows delicious floral elements and red fruits, wrapped around a medium-weight structure with a long, delicious finish and modulated, ripe tannins.

Name: Bandol
Wine Description: Dark garnet with violet hues. The nose is explosive with notes of black fruits, coffee, roasted and liquorice . On the palate, we find superimposed similar flavors with notes of truffles and cocoa .

Name: Barolo Marenca
Wine Description: It is wine-making process of Barolo Marenca takes place in horizontal fermentation tanks with temperature control for 12-15 days. The wine matures over 24 moths, partly in small wooden barrels and partly in large wooden barrels. Intense garnet red color. The nose is fresh, with complex perfumes that range from wild berries to vanilla, chocolate and aromatic herbs. On the palate it is very vigorous, rich in extracts, with lively and pleasant tannins that are rounded through a skilful use of wood. A powerful, tantalizing wine with a great ageing potential.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The perfume which jumps Bing and Rainer cherry notes. The palate is very supple and fruit forward with crushed cherry and raspberry flavors.

Name: Volnay
Wine Description: It has aromas of raspberry come together with notes of liquorice and earthiness. Clean and tight in the mouth, it is round on the finish with pleasant cherry-stone notes.

Name: Cuvée Sandra Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Boasting a dark ruby hue, the "Cuvee Sandra" is always layered with richness. Bursting with notes of strawberry, allspice, and kirsch along with a hint of earthiness, this wine is incredibly true to Pinot Noir and shows incredible depth, complexity and focus. Flavors of rhubarb pie, raspberry, mushroom, sassafras and plum boldly coat the palate which is enhanced by gentle tones of sweet oak and vanilla.

Name: Widdoes Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Pinot Noir Widdoes Vineyard, which comes from the cold Green Valley, exhibits deep berry notes, an almost briary character, with loamy soil undertones, some subtle oak, lots of red and black cherries, and a hints of pomegranate and plum.

Name: Il Carbonaione Alta Valle della Greve
Wine Description: Dark and inky, yet lively, exuding flavors of blackberry, plum and spice, with hints of chocolate and iron. The tannins are tucked into the rich texture. Finishes long and assertive.

Name: Gran Assemblage
Wine Description: Evolved, tertiary aromas of cured meat, paprika, brick dust and something honeyed, reminiscent of pollen. The palate is polished with earthy tannins and pungent flavors that are very tasty and have a classic, austere finish.

Name: Mason Pinot Nero
Wine Description: The nose evokes ripe red and black fruits: sweet berry and cherry fruits are enveloped in the bright ruby red robe of this wine, following on to a palate full of ripe red cherries and spice, a merest hint of smoke and gentle but pleasant tannins that all mingle to produce a great and satisfying wine.

Name: Chianti Classico Vigneto Gran Selezione San Lorenzo
Wine Description: Bright red , bright and intense . Bouquet of wild berries red berry . Attack brilliant where the fruity notes are complemented by spicy aromas . Elegant and refined .

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Swirling aromas of plum, raspberry, strawberry, sandalwood and cocoa powder immediately make their mark, followed by a fruity palate, and a full, round texture.

Name: Descendant
Wine Description: The colour making that immediately apparent; completely black/purple with healthy, vibrant magenta hues. A pure, wild, powerful nose of blackberry and tar is complimented by a gentle floral lift of lavender and violets. Full-bodied with great concentration, silky tannins and perfectly judged extract, this vigorous and suave young wine has a long, long future ahead of it.

Name: Pomerol
Wine Description: This wine has a deep purple hue and already reveals intense and complex aromas of black fruit, such as blackcurrant, blackberry and morello cherry, mingling harmoniously with notes of violets, sweet spices, eucalyptus, forest floor and already very well integrated oak. The entry on the palate is silky and deliciously flavoursome thanks to round, stylish and perfectly ripe tannins.

Name: Chateauneuf-du-Pape Rouge
Winery: Château de la Font du Loup

Name: Saint-Émilion Grand Cru (Premier Grand Cru Classé)
Barolo Ravera
Wine Description: It has brilliant garnet-red in color with orange highlights. Firm, elegant and potent on the nose, it has scents of dog rose, mint and tobacco, scents which meld in the course of time into spice, coffee, liquorice, truffle, leather and minerals. A full-bodied, rounded bouquet of great structure and balance, redolent of plum jam and withered brambles. The persistent chocolaty aftertaste is harmonious and enticing. Over the years it gradually refines its characteristics to achieve classic elegance and composure.

Name: Granato
Wine Description: The roots of Teroldego, a mountain grape variety, grow deep in the granitic and limestone rocks of the Campo Rotaliano, a small plain embedded between the steep rock faces of Trentino (North Italy).
